pageContext.claim: “Watch the caravan. Watch how sad and terrible it is, including for those people because they come up, and the crime that they inflict on themselves and that others inflict on them, it's a horrible, dangerous journey for them -- for them.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be referring to rape allegations within a caravan of Central Americans that was heading to the United States. But the rape allegations themselves are a matter of dispute. Reporters traveling with the caravan say they have seen no evidence of rapes within the caravan. The Central Americans are traveling in a group to prevent the violence that can be inflicted on individual travelers to the border.
